heading: HR00238
0: RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE GOVERNMENT TO IMMEDIATELY IMPOSE A NATIONWIDE MORATORIUM ON FORCED EVICTIONS AND DEMOLITIONS OF URBAN POOR COMMUNITIES, IN ORDER TO PROTECT THOUSANDS OF URBAN POOR FAMILIES FROM VIOLENT ATTACKS PENDING PROVISIONS FOR LIVELIHOOD, ADEQUATE HOUSING, AND SOCIAL SERVICES BY THE GOVERNMENT
principal-authors: CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2019-01-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00238
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING ON THE GOVERNMENT TO IMMEDIATELY IMPOSE A NATIONWIDE MORATORIUM ON FORCED EVICTIONS AND DEMOLITIONS OF URBAN POOR COMMUNITIES, IN ORDER TO PROTECT THOUSANDS OF URBAN POOR FAMILIES FROM VIOLENT ATTACKS PENDING PROVISIONS FOR LIVELIHOOD, ADEQUATE HOUSING, AND SOCIAL SERVICES BY THE GOVERNMENT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., DE JESUS, EMMI A., TINIO, ANTONIO L., BROSAS, ARLENE D., CASTRO, FRANCE L., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
